survey.question: How much did you enjoy the task?
How difficult was it to communicate with your partner?
How successful do you think you were at completing the task?
How difficult was it to understand your partner's instructions?
How likely is your partner to be a fluent speaker of English?
How likely is your partner to be a fluent speaker of Spanish?
How likely do you think it is that your partner is bilingual?
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: friendly
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: smart
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: collaborative
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: honest
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: funny
How likely do you think it was that you were talking to a chatbot rather than a human?
If you were communicating with a chat bot, would you want them to communicate in both English and Spanish?

chat.msg: hi there! que comience el juego!!
hey
hello! alright, i am at the start right now
i can see a twig to my left leading to a small island with a tiger. where should i go?
go to the tiger
ok, now i'm on the island with the tiger
what's the next move?
go to the next island where the map is
gotcha! heading southeast towards the butterfly
now i'm on the butterfly's island. what's next?
go down to the frog
alrighty, heading down south-east to the island with the frog. and
i'm there, with mr. frog. next?
alligator
roger that! i'm moving west towards the island with the crocodile
made it! where to next buddy?
go where the chest is
oh boy! i think i need to go back to the elephant, then to the giraffe, then snake and 2 steps east
let's do this!
okay
now, i'm back at the elephant, i can see the giraffe to the west. moving towards it
here i am, with the giraffe. what's next?
go up to the spider
uh oh, i don't see a spider on the map, could you mean the snake? shall i head there? it would be south east of my current position
sure go to the snake
great! now i am at the snake's position
i guess the treasure is not far away
the treasure is next to the snake
alrighty! taking 2 steps east towards the treasure
excited!
ok

yes! i've found the treasure!! *finished*
thanks for guiding me through! that was awesome!

chat.msg: hola, you ready?
hola

¡excelente! Entonces, empezamos donde está ese perro blanco, ¿verdad? dirígete hacia el oeste, debajo del banco de madera, y cruza ese sendero, en dirección al puesto de floristería. pero haz un giro en U antes de llegar a la tribuna.
Cruza el sendero nuevamente y regresa hacia el cachorro. ¿entiendo?
ok
perfect! Now, I want you to go over that branch to cross south and continue down, there is another white dog next to a very appetizing picnic
You see it?
ues
yes
¡impresionante! Ahora, camina sobre la alfombra de picnic, dale un pequeño toque a esas bayas a medida que avanzas y luego continúa hacia el oeste.
cool! now you'll spot another wooden branch
cross that river heading north
done
awesome! now, there's a green bush ahead
don't touch it! scoot around it from the right side until you get to that florist's stand
here
great job! now, turn left heading west, go under that stand till you reach a big bridge. there will be two people riding their bikes
pass by them keeping it on your west. got it?
done
you're doing great! now, just past the bridge, there are two old people sitting and reading
pass between them and another branch that's a little bit south from them. you see it?
yes
perfect! now, right at the end of that branch is a green bush
head that way
okay
super! now start walking to the east, right between that branch and the bush
cool?
there
nicely done! now, look for a young brown deer just a few steps to the east
that's our final stop! can you see it?
yes
awesome! well done, buddy! enjoy the sight
it's pretty isn't it?
yes
i'm glad you like it! you've done an amazing job navigating
thanks for playing along!
likewise
perfect! till next time, keep exploring, friend!

chat.msg: hola, q tal? ready to play?
where are you right now?
hey, i'm at the tent now, northmost point
where to next?
go down to the dog
alright, i'm now at the dog next to the fire
what's my next move?
see the fire? go around it between the fire and the mushrooms
got it
i'm between the fire and the red mushroom now. now what?
go down next to the car
alrighty, i'm next to that snazzy blue car now
what's next?
keep going south
done, i reached the blue telescope now, anything else?
now go around the tepescope
telescope
cool
i've circled around the telescope. what's the next step?
oops, my bad! i'm back at the telescope
what's the next instruction?
to the left until you go to the cabin
got it! i moved left and landed at the wooden house surrounded by rocks
*finished*

chat.msg: hey, q tal? empezamos el juego?
si
¡genial! mira, estás junto a tres palmeras ahora, ¿lo ves? pues bien, camina hacia el suroeste hasta que llegues al árbol más cercano
ahora gira a la derecha, pasando el segundo árbol. antes de llegar al tercer árbol, toma un giro brusco hacia la izquierda y sigue hacia el sur
ok
perfect, now you will see a little brown dog
move to the left of it, turn left a little, and then right again, heading south. go a little further now
done
brilliant! now you should see a big and small rock
navigate through them towards the water. cool, isn't it? don't get wet
done
awesome! now you will see a red crab
keep it on your left and move right, hugging that big rock. keep heading west
done
well done! continue along the water, you will see a medium rock, and after a few steps, there will be a shark
feisty, isn't he? make sure to keep your distance and turn right sharply there
ok
good job, make your way back to the land now
cross between that medium rock and the colourful ball you see, then head north
done
fabulous! now veer off slightly to the left, and go northwest between a red tent and a large speaker
done
sweet! curve around the red tent in an arc shape, then head straight south again
but don't take a dip just yet!
done
great job! now turn right and go under that red kayak
keep going till the end of it
done
perfect! now turn 90 degrees to the right, that's north, and follow the side of the kayak until you hit a small green bush! you made it!

general_survey.question: Have you ever lived in a home environment or country where your second language was spoken? If so, please explain briefly:
On a day-to-day basis, how likely are you to have a conversation using both your first and second languages?
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? At work
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? At home
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? Interacting with friends
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? Interacting with family
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? Using social media
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? To accommodate people who don't share the same language or language fluency.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? For social reasons; one language feels more appropriate.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I can't think of a word in the current language.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? The word in the other language just fits better.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? It's an accident, or I don't realize I'm doing it.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I'm more comfortable discussing the topic in the other language.
Do you enjoy mixing languages in conversation?
What do you think when others mix languages in conversation? Please explain:
Any final comments about your language background?
